com.inrix.sdk

Class LocationsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inrix.sdk.RefreshableManager<LocationsManager.Actions>
      • com.inrix.sdk.LocationsManager

  • public final class LocationsManager
extends RefreshableManager<LocationsManager.Actions>
    Manages asynchronous operations that involve locations that are saved by the user.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  LocationsManager.Actions
      Actions that the locations manager can perform.
      static class  LocationsManager.CreateLocationOptions
      Contains options that specify how to create a location.
      static class  LocationsManager.DeleteLocationOptions
      Contains options that specify how to delete a location.
      static interface  LocationsManager.ILastLocationsUpdateResponseListener
      Response listener for retrieving when locations were last updated.
      static interface  LocationsManager.ILocationDeleteResponseListener
      Response listener for deleting locations.
      static interface  LocationsManager.ILocationSaveResponseListener
      Response listener for saving locations.
      static interface  LocationsManager.ILocationsGetResponseListener
      Response listener for retrieving locations.
      static interface  LocationsManager.IUpdateLocationsOrderListener
      Response listener for the locations order.
      static class  LocationsManager.LocationsManagerException
      An exception that is thrown when there is an error with an LocationsManager operation.
      static class  LocationsManager.LocationType
      The type of location.
      static class  LocationsManager.UpdateLocationOptions
      Contains options that specify how to update a location.
      static class  LocationsManager.UpdateLocationsOrderOptions
      Contains options that specify how to update the order of locations in a list.

        Parameters:
        listener - The listener that will receive the response.
        Returns:
        An instance of ICancellable so that the request can be cancelled.
        Throws:
        LocationsManager.LocationsManagerException - when listener is null

        Saves a location.
        Parameters:
        options - The options that contain the location information.
        listener - The listener that will receive the response containing the new location.
        Returns:
        An instance of ICancellable so that the request can be cancelled.
        Throws:

        Deletes a saved location.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        An instance of ICancellable so that the request can be cancelled.
        Throws:
        LocationsManager.LocationsManagerException - when either options or listener is null.

      • getLastLocationsUpdate

        public final ICancellable getLastLocationsUpdate(LocationsManager.ILastLocationsUpdateResponseListener listener)
        Gets the date and time of the most recent update. The listener receives the latest known update timestamp for locations, custom routes, or alerts. The value is null if specified entry was never changed.

        This API can be used to check when the last update of locations occurred so you know if you need to request the actual locations payload.

        Parameters:
        listener - The listener that will receive the response.
        Throws:
        LocationsManager.LocationsManagerException - when listener is null.

      • updateOrder

        public final ICancellable updateOrder(LocationsManager.UpdateLocationsOrderOptions options,
                       LocationsManager.IUpdateLocationsOrderListener listener)
        Updates the order of locations in the list of the saved locations.
        Parameters:
        options - The options that contain the information how to order the locations.
        listener - The listener that will receive the response.
        Returns:
        An instance of ICancellable so that the request can be cancelled.
        Throws:
        LocationsManager.LocationsManagerException - when either options or listener is null.
